text: I'm doing a Bluesky thread writer and publisher. Here's an example of a thread it published just now. I had ChatGPT write a story about the many kinds of bread in the world and pushed that out as a thread of nine. Screen shot at the end of business today. This was the first Node.js app I wrote for Twitter back in 2014, it was called Little Pork Chop. Maybe you remember. Now it's the first app I wrote for Bluesky. Should have it usable in a day or two, knock wood. :smile:
